title: Salted Dark Chocolate Macadamia & Coconut Bites
directions: In your food processor pulse macadamia nuts until they are fine meal.
Add all other ingredients aside from coconut and pulse until dough-like.
Pulse in coconut until mixed without being finely blended.
Line a large plate with parchment paper.
Using your hands form dough into 1-inch balls.
Place in the freezer for 1-2 hours.
Prepare chocolate coating (directions here) or use a dark chocolate of choice (melted).
Place balls on a grated cooling rack with parchment or a dish below to catch drippings.
Remove balls from freezer, place on rack and using a spoon quickly drizzle chocolate evenly over the top and sides.
Enjoy immediately or place back in the refrigerator or freezer to enjoy at a later date.
ingredients: 1/2 Cup Large Super Fresh Soft Medjool Dates (Pitted & Chopped)
1 1/2 Tbsp Pure Maple Syrup (Coconut Sap or 10 Drops Liquid Stevia to make this recipe sugar free)
Prepare our Chocolate Coating Recipe found here. (or use melted vegan dark chocolate chips). Prepare recipe but do not freeze into chocolates. Leave at room temperature.
